AVR-drv 1.0
Atmel AVR 8 bit generic driver core set
  • Main Page
  • Related Pages
  • Modules
  • Data Structures

AVR-drv

Introduction

This project aims to provide drivers for AVR microntrollers from Atmel Corp. Drivers are designed with an per-chip approach.

Dependency

This project depend on AVR-Libc.

Build process currently uses AVR-Libc 1.7.1.
